document_data.name: Qos
document_data.titles: Grand Savant of the Fifth Order, Paragon of the Maalirni Order
document_data.mainbody: '''Qos''' was the most powerful of the [[dukar]] in [[Myth Nantar]].
document_data.Activities: Qos was one of the greatest mysteries of [[Serôs]]. He lived inside the [[Dukar Reef]] inside Myth Nantar and only his students and his fellow paragons had met him. Qos had total control over the [[Great Barrier]] and was the only paragon capable of teaching the peacekeeper's ways.
document_data.History: Qos was a key player in the [[Twelfth Serôs War]].
